thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service and helpful staff
thread.title_full: Great service and helpful staff - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Aliouche
title: Great service and helpful staff
text: The hotel is very clean, and staff are very helpful, especially Matt, Marius, and Laura. Always there to support, give directions, respond to any queries or needs. Great service and place. They offer 15% discount on breakfast in the restaurant next door. They have coffee vending machine 24/7 at the reception. Location of hotel is perfect right next to Paddington station and only a short distance from london's most famous attractions.
